channel.title: Help Please!
channel.description:
I got a virus,trojan,spyware,adware and some other stuff on my computer now. I've been trying for 1 1/2 days to remove all of it. But it keeps coming back. I have tried nod32, avast, spyware doctor, spybot, AVG, and Panda. None of them have deleted them properly.
Now the computer won't even let me login. It's stuck on "Windows is starting up." :( I'm using Dad's laptop right now.
Any help is appreciated (Please help).
Thanks Leader

item.title: Help Please!
item.dc:creator: @leader leader
item.description:
@leader wrote:

It won’t let me login. It stays on Windows is starting up.

Read full topic

item.title: Help Please!
item.dc:creator: @HomeForeva HomeForeva
item.description:
@HomeForeva wrote:

Star it up on safe mode on make “GoBack”

Read full topic
